rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
芬兰的严重交通伤害造成重大经济负担，直接成本在第一年内占主导地位研究估计了芬兰两年内严重交通伤害的总成本，结果表明直接成本占大部分，并且大多发生在受伤后的第一年内。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Severe-traffic-injuries-in-Finland-result-in-major-financial-burdens-with-direct-costs-dominate-within-the-first-年.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Severe-traffic-injuries-in-Finland-result-in-major-financial-burdens-with-direct-costs-dominate-within-the-first-年.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdf658c1-f3ad-4f00-ab96-8674540029c0 Thu, 16 May 2024 00:13:00 -0400 Severe traffic injuries in Finland result in major financial burdens, with direct costs dominating within the first year
互联网的使用会促进心理健康吗？发表在《技术、思维和行为》杂志上的研究发现，互联网接入和使用显着预测更高的心理健康状况，超过 96% 的案例显示，更高的互联网接入和使用程度与更高的心理健康状况相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Does-internet-use-boost-psychological-well-being.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Does-internet-use-boost-psychological-well-being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8f459f0-2513-4a94-930d-0df931405b94 Wed, 15 May 2024 23:51:00 -0400 Does internet use boost psychological well-being?
新研究发现 17 个基因驱动克隆造血并与衰老和疾病相关研究人员在英国生物银行的一个大型队列中确定了 17 个用于克隆造血的新基因，揭示了它们对衰老和疾病风险的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/New-study-uncovers-17-genes-driven-clonal-hematopoiesis-and-links-to-aging-and-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/New-study-uncovers-17-genes-driven-clonal-hematopoiesis-and-links-to-aging-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82b33017-de0a-4a76-bce7-4cdad31c2268 Wed, 15 May 2024 23:34:00 -0400 New study uncovers 17 genes driving clonal hematopoiesis and links to aging and disease
人体血液中发现的微塑料：潜在的心血管威胁国际环境组织的一项研究发现，人类血液中存在微塑料聚合物，由于其尺寸和形状，引发了人们对心血管风险的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Micro Plastics-found-in- human-blood-pottial-cardioangio-threat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Micro Plastics-found-in- human-blood-pottial-cardioangio-threat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f222ad68-d9eb-40fc-986f-28b06746d23b Wed, 15 May 2024 20:52:00 -0400 Microplastics found in human blood: potential cardiovascular threat
研究发现 COVID-19 与自身免疫性肺病的增加有关eBioMedicine 上的一项研究确定了 SARS-CoV-2 感染和 MDA5 自身免疫之间共有的免疫病理学，强调了 COVID-19 大流行期间 MDA5+ 病例和间质性肺疾病的激增。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/COVID-19-linked-to-rise-in-autoimmune-lung-disease-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/COVID-19-linked-to-rise-in-autoimmune-lung-disease-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b77f106-80a0-4677-88e3-cb231eddc25c Wed, 15 May 2024 20:21:00 -0400 COVID-19 linked to rise in autoimmune lung disease, study finds
研究发现抗肥胖药物可降低肥胖患者患心脏病的风险《肥胖》杂志上的一项研究评估了新型抗肥胖药物 (AOM) 对肥胖人群心血管疾病 (CVD) 的影响，发现这些药物可降低 CVD 并发症的风险，特别是心力衰竭和心房颤动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Anti-obesity-medications-slash-heart-disease-risk-in-obese-病人-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Anti-obesity-medications-slash-heart-disease-risk-in-obese-病人-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49bd1b1a-ae35-4851-a909-fa41272c976c Wed, 15 May 2024 20:08:00 -0400 Anti-obesity medications slash heart disease risk in obese patients, study finds
研究显示 TAVR 和 SAVR 在主动脉瓣置换术中的结果相当一项新的研究证明了微创心脏主动脉瓣置换手术——经导管主动脉瓣置换术（TAVR）——和外科主动脉瓣置换术（SAVR）之间的同等性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-shows-comparable-outcomes-for-TAVR-and-SAVR-in-aortic-valve-replacement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-shows-comparable-outcomes-for-TAVR-and-SAVR-in-aortic-valve-replacement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2899f20a-81ef-4204-b779-ec312e865b50 Wed, 15 May 2024 16:08:00 -0400 Study shows comparable outcomes for TAVR and SAVR in aortic valve replacement
研究揭示CNTN4基因在神经元发育和阿尔茨海默病发病机制中的作用新研究揭示了细胞蛋白质之间复杂的相互作用，以及它们如何影响神经发育障碍和阿尔茨海默病中的神经元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-reveals-CNTN4-genes-role-in-neuronal-development-and-Alzheimers-disease-pathogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-reveals-CNTN4-genes-role-in-neuronal-development-and-Alzheimers-disease-pathogenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83e2aec4-e12f-4d94-a70e-bac99664a803 Wed, 15 May 2024 16:00:45 -0400 Study reveals CNTN4 gene's role in neuronal development and Alzheimer's disease pathogenesis
关于运动如何帮助预防或减缓衰老过程中认知能力下降的新见解发表在《衰老细胞》上的新研究提供了关于运动如何有助于预防或减缓衰老过程中认知能力下降的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/New-insights-into-how-exercise-may-help-prevent-or-slow-cognitive-decline-during-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/New-insights-into-how-exercise-may-help-prevent-or-slow-cognitive-decline-during-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d13bf7e7-f5bf-4367-914f-ac8959a91aab Wed, 15 May 2024 15:53:53 -0400 New insights into how exercise may help prevent or slow cognitive decline during aging
探索中年已婚夫妇的正念、自我慈悲和关系满意度之间的联系许多人在日常生活中练习正念或自我同情技巧，作为正常自我护理的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Exploring-the-link- Between-mindativity-self-compassion-and-relationship-satisfaction-in-midlife-married- Couples.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Exploring-the-link- Between-mindativity-self-compassion-and-relationship-satisfaction-in-midlife-married- Couples.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=616aa27d-76fd-4ae5-8cdf-1aefdbadf08d Wed, 15 May 2024 15:49:28 -0400 Exploring the link between mindfulness, self-compassion, and relationship satisfaction in midlife married couples
